verses.text: O God, let \w the|strong="H1732"\w* voice \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* grief come \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* ear: keep \w my|strong="H1732"\w* life from \w the|strong="H1732"\w* fear \w of|strong="H1732"\w* those who are against me.

\w Keep|strong="H5341"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* safe \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w secret|strong="H5341"\w* purpose \w of|strong="H0430"\w* wrongdoers; \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* band \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* workers \w of|strong="H0430"\w* evil;
Who make \w their|strong="H5641"\w* tongues sharp like \w a|strong="H5641"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H0205"\w* whose arrows are pointed, even bitter words;

\w So|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* secret \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* let loose \w their|strong="H0834"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* at \w the|strong="H0834"\w* upright, suddenly \w and|strong="H2719"\w* unseen.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* make themselves strong \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w an|strong="H3384"\w* evil purpose; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* make holes \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w secret|strong="H4565"\w* nets; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* say, \w Who|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* see \w it|strong="H3808"\w*,

\w Or|strong="H7200"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* discovery \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* secret \w purpose|strong="H1697"\w*? \w The|strong="H0559"\w* design \w is|strong="H4310"\w* framed \w with|strong="H1697"\w* care; \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* inner \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* heart, \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w deep|strong="H2388"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w God|strong="H2664"\w* sends \w out|strong="H0376"\w* \w an|strong="H0376"\w* arrow \w against|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H0376"\w*; suddenly \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* wounded.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* evil \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* tongues \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w cause|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w fall|strong="H1961"\w*; all \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* see \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* shaking \w their|strong="H1961"\w* heads \w at|strong="H0430"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* fear \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* \w public|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w and|strong="H7200"\w* giving thought \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* acts \w they|strong="H5921"\w* get wisdom.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* upright \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* glad \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lovers \w of|strong="H0430"\w* righteousness \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w give|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* glory.
